title: Houston, we're here to help the farmers

title_detail.value: Houston, we're here to help the farmers

summary: Farmers irrigating their crops may soon be getting some help from space. In 2018, scientists launched ECOSTRESS, a new instrument now attached to the International Space Station. Its mission: to gather data on how plants use water across the world.
